text_block_list.text:
I head to the racecourse for tryouts,<n>imagining what
diamond in the rough<n>I'll see debut today.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: I've got this. I did my training. I canwin. I will win, with the strength ofmy own two legs.

I spot Gold City getting ready to race.<n>Looks like nerves are
getting the best<n>of her.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Where'd you come from? And<n>who are you? Wait,
that get-up...<n>You're a trainer with the academy?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Look, if you've got something to say<n>to me, save it for after
the race.<n>Otherwise, I'll pass.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her words sting a bit as she turns a<n>cold shoulder and
saunters off.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I turn my focus to the races, and<n>before long we're already
halfway<n>through the day. Scanning the field of<n>the
upcoming race, I spot a familiar<n>face.

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text:
Wow, she's so pretty! Just look at<n>her! So she's the one
they're all<n>talking about!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Oh, um... e-excuse me! Are you...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ...Yes? Are you talking to me?

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text: I knew it! You're the model, City,aren't you? I've seen you in amagazine. You're so gorgeous!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Ah... Yeah, thank you.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Whew, with looks like that, you can't<n>help but get excited to
see her race.<n>Go get 'em, City!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ...Right. I'll be sure to deliver a<n>captivating performance.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: But despite all the attention, during the<n>actual race...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Gold City is still trailing the pack with<n>400 meters to go! Not
looking good for<n>her!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Come on! I... I'm notdone yet! I can still do this!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: And she crosses the finish!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Fifth... Damn it.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Gold City puts up a good fight at the<n>very end, but it's not
enough.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Hmm. That late rally showed a<n>glimmer of potential, but
overall a<n>middling... or lackluster performance.<n>Well, not
bad for a model running as a<n>side gig.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Did you see her running, though?That golden hair waving in thewind—simply enchanting. Wow, am Iglad I got to see that!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Gold City leaves without a word, but<n>the look of raw
frustration on her face<n>leaves a lasting impression on me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm still going through her race in my<n>mind as I take an
evening stroll along<n>the riverbank.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Hey, City! Time out, time out! You're<n>literally going to kill me!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... What, Jordan, youalready beat?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I mean, yeah I'm beat. But City,you're feeling it in your legs too,aren't you? It's right after a bigrace—you seriously need to rest.

text_block_list.name: Gold City's Manager
text_block_list.text: City, Jordan's right.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Whoa, what the—?! Geez, that scared<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Manager... Hmph. What are you doing<n>here?

text_block_list.name: Gold City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
Any more of this and it'll affect your<n>work tomorrow. Just
look at those<n>wobbly legs—what if you fall and hurt<n>
yourself?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah. Wouldn't want a scratch<n>on your precious
money mannequin.

text_block_list.name: Gold City's Manager
text_block_list.text: City... Listen to me. I care aboutyou, and I'm saying this for yoursake.

text_block_list.name: Gold City's Manager
text_block_list.text: I've set up this next shoot toperfectly fit your image—cool,fierce, gorgeous, and—

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: I get it! I'll do my job, all right?!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
You've done a lot for me—I'm<n>thankful. And I owe you big
time, so<n>I'm not trying to quit modeling or<n>anything.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: But I'm also going to keeprunning and training! And I've told youagain and again to stay out of that!

text_block_list.name: Gold City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
...And I've always said that I'm<n>against it. City, you don't
know your<n>true worth!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Huh? My worth?! Choose your<n>words more carefully if
you're trying<n>to curry favor! I know I'm worth more<n>than
being your pinup—

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Oh my gosh! I'm totally craving abowl of curry right now!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ...What?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
I mean, it totally sounded like you said<n>"curry flavor," yeah?
You made me<n>hungry.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
So yeah, uh, Manager? Mind if the<n>two of us head out to
eat?

text_block_list.name: Gold City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
...All right. I have a meeting about<n>tomorrow, anyway. Don't
get yourself<n>hurt, okay?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
...She gone? Phew, talk about tension.<n>Your manager never
changes, huh.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Sigh... Sorry, Jordan. And nicethinking. Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha! City with a sincere thank<n>you? Who even are you?
★

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I wasn't kidding about being<n>hungry, though. Can we go
eat, like,<n>now?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ...Nah, I'm gonna run a bit more. You<n>go on ahead.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: For real? Okaaay. Don't overdo it,<n>yeah? Catch you later.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ...Okay. Let's do this.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: I'm not all looks. I'm not some dumb<n>dress-up doll.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: I'm going to be... the real me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Glistening with sweat and bathing in<n>the glory of the setting
sun as she<n>runs, I am struck by a profound<n>beauty.
